name: Escape from the Vampire's Tomb
description:
A nameless hero wakes up in a mysterious tomb.  How did he get here?  Who locked him inside?  And most importantly, how can he escape?  Contains strong language, blood, and mature themes.

Made VERY last-minute  for Vampire Jam.  HIRE ME TO WORK ON BLOODLINES 2, YOU COWARDS.

--Praise for ESCAPE FROM THE VAMPIRE'S TOMB!--

"This game is GLORIOUS." -Syera Miktayee

"BLOOD ISN'T BLUE INSIDE YOUR BODY." -Tiktalik
